name: Rasa Khosrowshahi
roles: I am ML/AI researcher at NICI lab and PhD student at Brock University. My recent focus in research is large-scale single- and multi-objective gradient-free neural network training and memory reduction.

Previously, my research focus was enhancing population-based algorithms to solve large-scale global optimization and black box optimization problems. I obtained my MSc in Electrical and Computer engineering at Ontario Tech University in one academic year, advised by Prof. Shahryar Rahnamayan and Prof. Masoud Makrehchi.
I have published and reviewed papers at CEC, SSCI, SMC, and CCECE conferences.
